profile.description: Validation profile used for this run (local, ci, or prod). Required per specs/09_validation_gates.md line 166.

issues.description: List of validation issues. Recognized error codes include Gate 14 content distribution codes: GATE14_ROLE_MISSING (1401), GATE14_STRATEGY_MISSING (1402), GATE14_TOC_HAS_SNIPPETS (1403), GATE14_TOC_MISSING_CHILDREN (1404), GATE14_GUIDE_INCOMPLETE (1405), GATE14_GUIDE_COVERAGE_INVALID (1406), GATE14_FORBIDDEN_TOPIC (1407), GATE14_CLAIM_QUOTA_EXCEEDED (1408), GATE14_CLAIM_QUOTA_UNDERFLOW (1409), GATE14_CLAIM_DUPLICATION (1410), GATE14_MANDATORY_PAGE_MISSING (1411, TC-983: mandatory page from merged ruleset config not found in page_plan).

manual_edits.description: True if run used emergency manual edits mode and any manual content edits occurred.

manual_edited_files.description: List of content files that were manually edited (only allowed when run_config.allow_manual_edits=true).
